message.entry:
The property "{0}" in ROS message type "{1}" with data type ({2}) is converted to data type ({3}) in the Simulink Bus.
<actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="fixit" retvalue="false"> <cmd>ros.slros.internal.bus.Util.setInt64SLBusMode(''{4}'',true);set_param(''{4}'','SimulationCommand','update');</cmd> <txt>Remove conversion of ROS message properties with "{2}" data type to "{3}" in the Simulink Bus.</txt> </action> </actions>

The array property "{0}" in ROS message "{1}" can have a maximum of {2,number,integer} items in Simulink, but the received message has {3,number,integer} items. The array property in the Simulink bus will be truncated to {4,number,integer} items.
<actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="fixit" retvalue="false"> <cmd>ros.slros.internal.bus.Util.setMaxLength(''{5}'',''{1}'',''{0}'',{3,number,integer});</cmd> <txt>Increase the maximum array number of items of the "{0}" property in "{1}" to {3,number,integer}.</txt> </action> <action type="suggestion" retvalue="false"> <cmd>ros.slros.internal.dlg.ArraySizeManager.launch(''{5}'');</cmd> <txt>Adjust the maximum array sizes for this model.</txt> </action> </actions>
